name: Compliance Solutions OSHA Painter Kit

target_audience_match: Designed for stressed-out painting contractors who need a grab-and-go solution that inspectors actually approve.

name: Seton OSHA Painter Safety Starter Pack
description: Essential OSHA-compliant gear and documentation perfect for small crews or new hires.
target_audience_match: Perfect for growing teams or overwhelmed subs trying to meet safety rules without red tape.

name: J. J. Keller Painter Compliance Kit
description: Trusted compliance pack with documentation, labels, and inspection forms used by major contractors.
target_audience_match: Ideal for pros who want bulletproof compliance and a reputation for jobsite safety leadership.

name: Grainger Paint Safety Compliance Kit
description: Highly customizable OSHA-compliant kit with industrial-grade PPE and spill control.
target_audience_match: Best for large jobsite crews who need rugged compliance gear and serious spill protection.

name: Safety Services Company Painter Compliance Pack
description: OSHA-certified training and compliance documents with optional PPE kits sent to your site.
